onCreate(Bundle) - Method in class com.example.android.OprahMovieApp.DetailActivity
 
onCreate(SQLiteDatabase) - Method in class com.example.android.OprahMovieApp.favorites.FDBInterface
If there is no existing table for storing favorite movies, this makes a new one.
onCreate(Bundle) - Method in class com.example.android.OprahMovieApp.FavoritesActivity
 
onCreate(Bundle) - Method in class com.example.android.OprahMovieApp.MainActivity
onCreate is the Android system callback method that is called upon creation of the application.
onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu) - Method in class com.example.android.OprahMovieApp.DetailActivity
 
onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu) - Method in class com.example.android.OprahMovieApp.MainActivity
Android callback method which creates a menu in the action bar in the upper-right corner of the screen.
onCreateView(LayoutInflater, ViewGroup, Bundle) - Method in class com.example.android.OprahMovieApp.DetailActivityFragment
 
onOptionsItemSelected(MenuItem) - Method in class com.example.android.OprahMovieApp.DetailActivity
When the user clicks the add to favorites or remove from favorites button in the detailed view menu, add or remove the movie currently in view from the favorites list and update the button in the menu.
onOptionsItemSelected(MenuItem) - Method in class com.example.android.OprahMovieApp.MainActivity
When the user clicks the sort by option in the main menu, toggle the sort method between Popularity and User Rating and update the view.
onPostExecute(List<Movie>) - Method in class com.example.android.OprahMovieApp.data.FetchMoviesTask
AsyncTask method which defines what is to be done after finishing the task - in our case, it sends the movie data to the movie adapter.
onSaveInstanceState(Bundle) - Method in class com.example.android.OprahMovieApp.MainActivity
Android system callback method which is called when the app is terminated.
onUpgrade(SQLiteDatabase, int, int) - Method in class com.example.android.OprahMovieApp.favorites.FDBInterface
If the database version has changed, this drops the old table and makes a new one.
